articles.content: Ummm, no. That was Beta 1. Theres no such option in this Beta, Do you guys even check sourcing? Its one thing to verify if lossless is happening, another to not even check and see if an option is the… [+1923 chars]

articles.author: Jordan Valinsky, CNN Business
articles.title: Microsoft issues urgent security warning: Update your PC immediately - CNN
articles.description: Microsoft is urging Windows users to immediately install an update after security researchers found a serious vulnerability in the operating system.
articles.content: We deleted the POC of PrintNightmare. To mitigate this vulnerability, please update Windows to the latest version, or disable the Spooler service. For more RCE and LPE in Spooler, stay tuned and wait… [+88 chars]
